snippet.title: Peril mod for Quake Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for the Peril mod, a massive Quake mod featuring 42 large and detailed maps, custom sounds, textures, and atmosphere. This mod is based on Arcane Dimensions and offers an immersive experience with complex environments and engaging gameplay.
Played with Reshade
.
Audio from Child With The Mustache: 
Quake theme remake by Andrew Hulshult But Its Only The Good Part
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XWw0wUgOvao

Download:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/peril

Preset:
https://fastupload.io/478d9558cbe67b35

If you'd like to support this channel
paypal.me/OldGamesReshade  

Subscribe to my channel for more Quake mods and gaming content! If you enjoy this mod, share it with your friends and leave a comment to let me know what you think.

#QuakeMods #PerilMod #ReshadeTrailer #ClassicFPS #RetroGaming #QuakeGameplay #ModdingCommunity
